mapper.select: SELECT a.EQPMN_ID ,a.EQPMN_NM ,a.UPPER_EQPMN_ID ,b.EQPMN_NM as upper_name FROM (SELECT * FROM KJP_EQPMN_CODE WHERE eqpmn_obj='Y') a JOIN KJP_EQPMN_CODE b ON a.UPPER_EQPMN_ID =b.EQPMN_ID

SELECT a.CHCK_SN , /*점검key*/ a.EQPMN_SN, /*장비key*/ b.EQPMN_NM, /*장비 이름*/ a.CHCK_DAY, /*점검일*/ a.FRST_REGIST_DT, /*최초등록일*/ a.FRST_REGISTER_SN, /*최초등록자*/ a.UPDT_DT, /*수정일*/ a.UPDUSR_SN /*수정등록자*/ FROM KJP_EQPMN_CHCK a JOIN KJP_EQPMN b ON a.EQPMN_SN = b.EQPMN_SN
AND a.EQPMN_SN = #{eqpmnSn}

/*KJP_EQPMN_D_CHCK 점검 마스터 디테일*/ SELECT CHCK_D_SN, /*점검key*/ CHCK_SN, /*점검마스터 key*/ CHCK_NM, /*점검이름*/ CHCK_RESULT, /*점검결과*/ CHCK_CN, /*비고*/ FRST_REGIST_DT, /*최초등록일*/ FRST_REGISTER_SN, /*최초등록자*/ UPDT_DT, /*수정일*/ UPDUSR_SN, /*수정등록자*/ rownum FROM KJP_EQPMN_D_CHCK
AND CHCK_SN = #{chckSn}

INSERT INTO KJP_EQPMN_CHCK ( CHCK_SN ,EQPMN_SN ,CHCK_DAY ,FRST_REGIST_DT ,FRST_REGISTER_SN)
